title: Curtis Shaw, Budget BBQ, Joe Jackson, Johnny Gill, Magic Johnson, LA Lakers, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Curtis Shaw, Budget BBQ, Joe Jackson, Johnny Gill, Magic Johnson, LA Lakers, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Today Curtis Shaw from Cleveland introduces the cast. We find out if $55.07 is an adequate budget for BBQing. The patriarch of The Jackson family Joe Jackson passes. Johnny Gill tries to help Tommy. Magic Johnson gives himself a deadline to turn the Lakers around. Sheryl Underwood stops by the show. Carla's Reality Update is back with talk of Basketball Wives. Big Dog points out the power of our imagination in Closing Remarks today.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
